00069 #define ZCL_DEFINE_GENERIC_TUNNEL_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES() \
00070   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(maximumIncomingTransferSize, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_GENERIC_TUNNEL_CLUSTER_SERVER_MITS_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID), \
00071   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(maximumOutgoingTransferSize, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_GENERIC_TUNNEL_CLUSTER_SERVER_MOTS_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID), \
00072   DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(protocolAddress, ZCL_READWRITE_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_GENERIC_TUNNEL_CLUSTER_SERVER_PROTOCOL_ADDR_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_OCTET_STRING_DATA_TYPE_ID)
00073 
00074 #define ZCL_DEFINE_GENERIC_TUNNEL_CLUSTER_COMMANDS(matchProtocolAddressCommandInd, matchProtocolAddressResponseCommandInd, advertiseProtocolAddressInd) \
00075   DEFINE_COMMAND(matchProtocolAddressCommand, ZCL_GENERIC_TUNNEL_MATCH_PROTOCOL_ADDRESS_COMMAND_ID, COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), matchProtocolAddressCommandInd), \
00076   DEFINE_COMMAND(matchProtocolAddressResponseCommand, ZCL_GENERIC_TUNNEL_MATCH_PROTOCOL_ADDRESS_RESPONSE_COMMAND_ID, COMMAND_OPTIONS(SERVER_TO_CLIENT, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), matchProtocolAddressResponseCommandInd), \
00077   DEFINE_COMMAND(advertiseProtocolAddress, ZCL_GENERIC_TUNNEL_ADVERTISE_PROTOCOL_ADDRESS_COMMAND_ID, COMMAND_OPTIONS(SERVER_TO_CLIENT, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), advertiseProtocolAddressInd)

00079 #define GENERIC_TUNNEL_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00080 {   \
00081   .id = GENERIC_TUNNEL_CLUSTER_ID, \
00082   .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_APPLICATION_LINK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00083   .attributesAmount = ZCL_GENERIC_TUNNEL_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00084   .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00085   .commandsAmount = ZCL_GENERIC_TUNNEL_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00086   .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00087 }

00129 typedef struct PACK
00130 {
00131   uint8_t protocolAddress[1]; 
00132 } ZCL_MatchProtocolAddress_t;
00136 typedef struct PACK
00137 {
00138   uint8_t protocolAddress[1]; 
00139 } ZCL_AdvertiseProtocolAddress_t;
00143 typedef struct PACK
00144 {
00145   uint64_t deviceIeeeAddress;
00146   uint8_t  protocolAddress[1]; 
00147 } ZCL_MatchProtocolAddressResponse_t;
00151 typedef struct PACK
00152 {
00153     struct PACK
00154     {
00155         ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00156         uint8_t type;
00157         uint8_t properties;
00158         uint16_t value;
00159     } maximumIncomingTransferSize;
00160 
00161     struct PACK
00162     {
00163         ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00164         uint8_t type;
00165         uint8_t properties;
00166         uint16_t value;
00167     } maximumOutgoingTransferSize;
00168 
00169     struct PACK
00170     {
00171         ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00172         uint8_t type;
00173         uint8_t properties;
00174         uint8_t value[OCTET_STRING_MAX_SIZE];
00175     } protocolAddress;
00176 } ZCL_GenericTunnelClusterServerAttributes_t;
00177 END_PACK
00181 typedef struct
00182 {
00183     struct
00184     {
00185         ZCL_CommandId_t id;
00186         ZclCommandOptions_t options;
00187         ZCL_Status_t (*matchProtocolAddressCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, ZCL_MatchProtocolAddress_t *payload);
00188     } matchProtocolAddressCommand;
00189 
00190     struct
00191     {
00192         ZCL_CommandId_t id;

00194         ZCL_Status_t (*matchProtocolAddressResponseCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, ZCL_MatchProtocolAddressResponse_t *payload);
00195     } matchProtocolAddressResponseCommand;
00196

00198     {
00199         ZCL_CommandId_t id;

00201         ZCL_Status_t (*advertiseProtocolAddress)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, ZCL_AdvertiseProtocolAddress_t *payload);
00202     } advertiseProtocolAddress;
